channel.title: Posts on Plop !
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Plop !

item.title: Grab a nice wallpaper every day
item.description:
This is a small tool I developed to grab the latest image from the National Geographic’s website and save it in a specific folder. With a small cron job, it is then ran every day automatically.

Since no API is being provided, we must scrap the webpage for the information we want. However, looking at the source code of the page, we can see this interesting line :

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Hello world, I am just messing around with hugo the static website generator.
